document_data.name: Githyanki Half-Plate
document_data.mainbody: '''''Githyanki half-plate''''' armor was the variety of [[half plate]] mail worn by [[githyanki]] soldiers and raiders.
document_data.Description: Each set of armor was said to had been forged under the strict guidance of githyanki smiths, according to exact specifications set out by the Undying Queen [[Vlaakith CLVII]] herself.
document_data.Powers: It was difficult for an individual wearing this armor to move in a stealthy manner.
document_data.Variations: The githyanki developed an [[enchanted]] version of this armor called ''[[psionic ward armor]]'', used to protect their warriors from the [[psionic]] powers of [[illithid]]s.
